message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $140. I think it's a great deal and would be very valuable to you.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I believe I can find it elsewhere within my budget. I am willing to pay $130 for the product.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but I'm looking for something closer to $135. Would that work for you?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering my budget constraints, I am willing to pay $132 for the product.
